"#ifdef GL_ES
" + "precision mediump float;
" + "#endif
"+ "uniform vec3 u_color;"+ "uniform vec2 u_viewport; "+ "void main(void){ "+ "    vec2 uv = gl_FragCoord.xy/u_viewport; "+ "    float res = mix(0.0, 0.0001, uv.x); "+ "    gl_FragColor = vec4(u_color, res); "+ "}"
